EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_11/12/13Launch_Q413.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for our announcement this morning at 10AM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Than you for registering. Our special announcement is today, November 12 @10AM PST. Our webcast will include details about the launch of Pivotal One, including Pivotal CF, powered by Cloud Foundry.
To join the event, please visit www.gopivotal.com/theplatform <http://www.gopivotal.com/theplatform> and Learn how to drive innovation and build great software from Pivotal executives and other special guests. The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
What's New at Pivotal? Read Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
